lessonInfo.title: Web Development Level 1 - Lesson 6
lessonInfo.description: Fonts, More CSS Selectors, and CSS Specificity

parts.title: Part 1 - Introduction to Fonts
parts.description: Learn about fonts and typography in CSS. Discover font families, Google Fonts, and how to use custom fonts with @font-face.
keyConcepts: Font families: serif, sans-serif, monospace, cursive, fantasy
Google Fonts and how to use them

question1.text: What are the five generic font families in CSS?

options.text: Arial, Times, Courier, Comic Sans, Impact
A free library of fonts you can use in your website

question3.text: What CSS rule do you use to define a custom font?

parts.title: Part 2 - Advanced CSS Selectors
parts.description: Learn about the DOM (Document Object Model) and advanced CSS selectors including combinator selectors, pseudo selectors, and attribute selectors.
keyConcepts: DOM (Document Object Model) and parent-child relationships

question1.text: What does the '>' selector do in CSS?

question2.text: What does the :hover pseudo selector do?

options.text: Applies styles when you move your mouse over an element

question3.text: How do you select an element with a specific attribute in CSS?

parts.title: Part 3 - CSS Specificity
parts.description: Understand how CSS determines which styles to apply when there are conflicts. Learn the specificity hierarchy and when order matters.
keyConcepts: IDs are more specific than classes
Classes are more specific than type selectors
When specificity is equal, order matters (last one wins)

question1.text: Which CSS selector has the HIGHEST specificity?

question2.text: If two CSS rules have the same specificity, which one wins?

options.text: The first one in the code
The last one in the code

question3.text: What is more specific: a class selector or an ID selector?

parts.title: Part 4 - Review of Lessons 1-6
parts.description: Review all the concepts covered in Lessons 1 through 6, including HTML basics, CSS styling, forms, and advanced selectors.

question1.text: Please take the Quiz when you're ready!
